payload: Create 9 specifications based on 35 findings in ISSUES.md. Specifications needed: skills.spec.md (skill architecture, context fork, workflow patterns), tasklist.spec.md (Layer 0 orchestration, workflow types, subagent integration), quality.spec.md (11-dimensional framework, autonomy scoring, progressive disclosure), autonomy-knowledge.spec.md (80-95% requirements, execution patterns), progressive-disclosure-knowledge.spec.md (Tier 1/2/3 structure, <500 lines rule), quality-standards-knowledge.spec.md (compliance requirements), hub-and-spoke-knowledge.spec.md (hub-and-spoke patterns, forked workers), url-validation-knowledge.spec.md (URL verification, currency checking), audit-findings.spec.md (known issues, remediation guidance). Extract specifications from .claude/rules/, tests/skill_test_plan.json, and audit reports. All specs must be implementation-focused with examples and clear behavioral standards.
